io.vertx.ext.auth.jwt

Interface JWTAuth

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AuthProvider

    public interface JWTAuth
extends AuthProvider
    Factory interface for creating JWT based AuthProvider instances.
    Author:
    Paulo Lopes

      • generateToken

        String generateToken(JsonObject claims,
                     io.vertx.ext.jwt.JWTOptions options)
        Generate a new JWT token.
        Parameters:
        claims - Json with user defined claims for a list of official claims
        options - extra options for the generation
        Returns:
        JWT encoded token
        See Also:
